text:
[Verse]
Wake up to a gray sky
But I don’t mind the gloom
Sunshine in my pocket
Got this room like boom

[Verse 2]
Steppin out without fear
Splashin’ puddles on my way
Laughing with the thunder
Gonna seize the day

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel the drops like a beat
Spinning round and round
Got the world at my feet

[Verse 3]
Lightning in the distance
But the rhythm doesn’t stop
Heart's like a drum
Goin' pop pop pop

[Verse 4]
Clouds might hang low
But I lift my spirits high
Spreading love like a rainbow
Paint the gloomy sky

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain
Feel the drops like a beat
Spinning round and round
Got the world at my feet
title: Dancing in the Rain
